We understand that dialysis is vital to our patients’ health, and missing treatments can have serious consequences. This is why we’ve launched the Campaign “Every Dialysis Treatment Saves Lives,” which focuses on the critical importance of adhering to a dialysis schedule.Why is Staying on Schedule Important?Missing dialysis treatments can be very dangerous. Dialysis removes waste and extra fluids from your blood, which helps keep your body healthy. When you miss a treatment, these waste products can build up in your system, leading to serious health problems.
